definition: to inspect/to review/to read/to peruse/to go through/to experience
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
electronic reader (e.g. for barcodes, RFID tags etc)

sentences.english: Rita repeated what Reardon recited when Reardon road the remarks.
sentences.chinese: 當利爾登閱讀評論時，麗塔複述爾登背誦的東西。

sentences.english: The number of books, and the rate of reading them, matters not a whit. It’s not a competition.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀的數量，以及速率說明不了什麼。

sentences.english: So, apps such as Pandora internet radio can be listened to while reading the news using another app.
sentences.chinese: 例如你在閱讀新聞的時候同時收聽潘朵拉網絡廣播。

sentences.english: Reading comprehension is a reading process where readers can construct the meaning of version.
sentences.chinese: 讀解就是讀者建構文本意義的閱讀過程。

sentences.english: The question is whether the dedicated have had more influence than the image- flashers .
sentences.chinese: 問題是無論如何對閱讀的這種關注比圖片根由影響。

sentences.english: He suggested them read at least one book on the legal rights.
sentences.chinese: 他建議他們至少閱讀一本關於法定權利的書。

sentences.english: Stars become the official page, the stars become the novel to read.
sentences.chinese: 星辰變官方頁面，星辰變小說閱讀。

sentences.english: The reading room of the British Library, UK.
sentences.chinese: 大英圖書館中央閱讀室，倫敦。

sentences.english: We do more reading after school.
sentences.chinese: 我們做更多的課外閱讀是很重要的。

sentences.english: Bond, comes with the war, is my understanding after read this chapter.
sentences.chinese: 債券，隨着戰爭來臨時，是我閱讀本章後的理解。

sentences.english: But you would never know that from reading the oped.
sentences.chinese: 但是僅憑閱讀評論你永遠不會知道此情況。

sentences.english: But that is not the sort of reading I have in mind.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我心目中的閱讀不屬於這一種。

sentences.english: Read your software contracts, and make sure you understand your licensing rights.
sentences.chinese: 仔細閱讀軟件合同，確保你明白了享有的許可權。

sentences.english: Do this with every story you read.
sentences.chinese: 以這種方式閱讀每一個故事。

sentences.english: There are general patterns for reading comprehension passages.
sentences.chinese: 對於這一點，閱讀理解部分其實是有跡可循的。

definition: to hit/to press/to strike (on the keyboard)/to click (a web page button)
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
to pay attention to/to follow sth closely/to follow (on social media)/concern/interest/attention
variant of 聯結|联结[lian2 jie2]
